text: The mayor left out the basis for trump tolerance: combo of disaffection and low expectations and this potus making the sell that he is for them when others seem to forget them. How does the mayor fill that need? That’s the battle. Exposing potus weaknesses is easy.
author: ChrisCuomo

text: There is a lot of this preliminary analysis...and it all revolves around a central issue going forward: what standard of proof matters? If it is not a felony is it ‘fine’? Potus favors that test. Dems in Congress will certainly favor something less that that. Up to you.
author: ChrisCuomo

text: Issues: classified info; derogatory info about non-indicted individuals; AG reckonings of public interest; AND - White House lobbying on disclosure. Don’t discount the last. On the others, there will be arguments both ways on level of disclosure. More is better here
author: ChrisCuomo

text: news: we still don’t know anything about the depth of #mueller findings. This waiting process was oddly strung out and teased for what this is. That’s not on media; doj was making this much more than it needed to be. Hopefully the release of the actual report will be better
author: ChrisCuomo

text: Dialogue here is “prove any additional measure would have stopped the massacre that motivated it”; in NZ it was “it can’t hurt and it might help so let’s do it”
author: ChrisCuomo

text: This is like the notion of addition by subtraction
author: ChrisCuomo

text: They will learn...”loyalty” is a one way street. Even state tv has to stay on message to keep preference. Of course, this is largely about the trump trios at night and on the am couch.
author: ChrisCuomo

text: Likes despot; doesn’t like war hero senator. Key is why: all about personal interest in the moment.
author: ChrisCuomo

text: #irony ... but thanks to whomever wrote these words
author: ChrisCuomo

text: As well told as it is beautiful.
author: ChrisCuomo

text: Civil Society Needs a Media Without Walls - The National Herald
author: ChrisCuomo

text: We are not immune to the insurgency of hate. We never have been. This is the latest, not the first. And not the worst...but as always, it demands our best.
author: ChrisCuomo

text: As with Russian Interference...if potus thinks something is not good for him...he minimizes it
author: ChrisCuomo

text: He guesses they have problems? He needs to start listening to his daily brief. Find another world leader of a democracy who agrees with this
author: ChrisCuomo
